featured.text: Today David wears casual clothes—khaki pants and a sports shirt—to the office.
The idea was developed when a Spanish designer travelling to the Philippines observed a traditional Filipino shirt 22 together with the fibers of pineapple leaves.

definition.zh_def: 一種通常由布料製成的衣物，通常有袖子和領口，穿在上半身。
definition.en_def: A piece of clothing made typically of fabric, usually having sleeves and a collar, worn on the upper body.
definition.example: He wore a blue shirt to the party.
